member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Themes.MaterialDesign.MaterialDesignResourceDictionary
member.summary: The ResourceDictionary used to theme the basic controls in MaterialDesign.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.Themes.MaterialDesign.MaterialDesignResourceDictionary.AccentColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the accent color used for the controls in MaterialDesign. The default setting is DarkRed.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.Themes.MaterialDesign.MaterialDesignResourceDictionary.IsDark
member.summary: Gets or sets if the mode for the controls in MaterialDesign is dark or light. When set to true, the mode is dark; when set to false, the mode is light. The default setting is true.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.Themes.MaterialDesign.MaterialDesignResourceDictionary.PrimaryColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the primary color used for the controls in MaterialDesign. The default is DarkRed.
